text: innu a godeya sangati enendare, adu urina ibbaru anatha balakarige serittu. Avarige serida khajaneyondu adara taladallittu. Avara tande obba sajjananagiddanu. Avaribbaru tam'ma yavvanavannu talupi, tam'ma khajaneyannu hora tegeyabekembudu nim'ma odeyana nirdharavagittu. Idella nim'ma odeyana karune. Nanu idavudannu nanna iccheyinda madilla. Nimage sahisalikkagada visayagala vastava idu
